text: I was 3 when I told my mom that I knew what my dharma was and that I wanted to be an actor.
author: Brie Larson

text: For a kid who's lost his mom and all the rage and grief that no one was able to talk out of me, football was a very therapeutic sport. Very.
author: Jon Hamm

text: I wanted to marry a girl just like my mom.
author: Michael Bergin

text: But the fact is, I'm not work-identified. I'm not a lawyer or a writer. I'm a mom, and I'm a woman, and that's the kind of people I want to see in books in the starring role.
author: Lisa Scottoline

text: My father left... but I tell my mom - and I told my mom this when I was a kid - I said, 'You know what, Mom? Good thing he left because you're a strong woman.'
author: J. R. Martinez
